((Code I would talk about anyone's leadership in character or out remember 
this proverb "The teapot can't talk about the kettle because there both 
cracked.))

Liono stops "Tigerhawk I'll meet you back at base later I have to go to the 
memorial."
Flies off to the East.

Tigerhawk laughs "Good look in your fight kick ass Lio Convoy"

Lio Convoy grins "I like that from here on out that's who I am I never can 
lie to you old man. Prime Jets maximum Burn" Liono shoot off.

Tigerhawk over hears Prowl and archangel "This my Idea prowl I'll make what 
ever repairs we need to get this ship off the ground or whatever needs 
fixing. You go get your Lady friend back" Tosses prowl the holocubes (( You 
might try my plan this time.))

::Elsewhere on earth::

"Is my beastmode ready Computer"    

Computer is scanning "yes you my exit Dark Convoy"

Dark Convoy steps out look into mirror His lower body is that of an oversized 
Black Lion  while his upper body is that of a huminoid with will defined Lion 
features a long black brads that are wrapped in metal. "Excellent now the 
finishing process he extends his arms attach my transmetal cyberneticts

Computer master "Dark Convoy it is already done"

Dark Convoy studies his arms and hands "The metal cyber venom claws nice 
touch looks at the twin forearm Bracers one extends a long Light green Energy 
blade. Looks to his other forearm shoot a ball of energy at the computer.

Computer "Master Dark Convoy that is highly irregular please don't damage me."

Dark Convoy "Laughs I would never" Closes his hand and the ball disappears. 
"Now where is my prey" 

Computer "heading here even as we speak" 

Dark Convoy folds his arms across his chest say cloaked until I give you 
other orders shield defense to maximum.
